name: DiscordJam 2019 - Escapi
description:
Escapi is a top/down stealth/puzzle game where you play as an octopus trying to escape captivity. This was a small game made over a weekend as part of the 2nd annual DiscordJam.

Controls:

  • Move - Up/Down/Left/Right Arrow Keys
  • Pause Game - P
  • Quit Game - Q

DiscordJam is a mini game jam run through Discord. It is made up of awesome passionate folks who met via Battleborn.

The Team:

  • Cat Cornett - Music, Writing
  • Leaddy - Technical Support (with us in spirit)
  • carnemorta - Artist
  • BlaineTheBro - Moral Support
  • nemosis327 - Producer
  • Leftcircle - Level Design
  • beya - Artist, Design, Writing
  • lowlines - Programmer, UI/UX Design

Project Blog:
